long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tracks which SaaS apps the user is using.

Cloudeagle plugin Tracker keeps track of how you spend time on the web and presents the stats in a useful and intuitive way.
CloudEagleâ€™s SaaS recommendations and unique vendor insights helped customers get an extra discount.
Cloudeagle extension will help cloudeagle system to know interests and preferences of customers so cloudeagle can give better experience.


Q: Who is it for?:
A: The Cloudeagle plugin is designed for Cloudeagle customers to track SaaS products that they visit.

Q: Why does the extension need access to "read and change all your data on the websites you visit"?
A: We use the data to get better recommendations for your SaaS product.
